textBeforeTable: Events Bishop of Almería Deceased --> Bishop Bernardo Martinez y Noval, O.S.A.
textAfterTable: Note(s): ¹ Year Uncertain MicroData Summary for Bernardo Martínez y Noval: Bishop Bernardo Martínez y Noval O.S.A. (born 1 Mar 1868, died 24 Jun 1934) Bishop of Almería a priest for 41.7 years a bishop for 12.5 years Principal Consecrator: Bishop Prudencio Melo y Alcalde † Bishop of Madrid Principal Co-Consecrators: Bishop Zacarías Martínez y Núñez, O.S.A. † Bishop of Huesca Bishop Manuel de Castro y Alonso † Bishop of Segovia Episcopal Lineage / Apostolic Succession: Bishop Prudencio Melo y Alcalde † (1908) Bishop of Madrid Gregorio María Cardinal Aguirre y García, O.F.M. † (1885) Archbishop of Burgos Archbishop Mariano Rampolla del Tindaro † (1882) Titular Archbishop of Heraclea in Europa Edward Henry Cardinal Howard † (1872) Archpriest of the Basilica di San Pietro in Vaticano {Saint Peter Basilica} Carlo Cardinal Sacconi † (1851) Cardinal-Bishop of Palestrina Giacomo Filippo Cardinal Fransoni † (1822) Cardinal-Priest of Santa Maria in Ara Coeli Pietro Francesco Cardinal Galleffi † (1819) Cardinal-Bishop of Albano Alessandro Cardinal Mattei † (1777) Cardinal-Bishop of Ostia
